mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATCHECKLASTMSG (CHANNELID, LOGINID, SENDERID, MESSAGEID, SORTID) VALUES ( #{channelId}, #{loginId}, #{senderId}, #{messageId}, #{sortId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE SENDERID = #{senderId}, LOGINID = #{loginId}, MESSAGEID = #{messageId}, SORTID = #{sortId};
INSERT INTO unread (LOGINID, TOTALUNREAD) VALUES ( #{loginId}, #{totalUnread} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TOTALUNREAD = #{totalUnread};
INSERT INTO exitchatroomtime (LOGINID, CHANNELID, CREATEDAT) VALUES ( #{loginId}, #{channelId}, #{createdAt} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CREATEDAT = #{createdAt};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM exitchatroomtime WHERE CHANNELID = #{channelId} AND LOGINID = #{loginId}
